graphedge.description: Represents an edge from the dependency map.

acceptedFlows.description: Number of accepted flows in the edge.

defaultAcceptedFlows.description: The truth value that indicates if there are accepted default flows.

defaultRejectedFlows.description: The truth value that indicates if there are rejected default flows.

destinationController.description: Name of the remote destination controller if different than the current one.

destinationID.description: ID of the destination `GraphNode` of the edge.

destinationType.description: Type of the destination `GraphNode` of the edge.

details.description: Contains more flow details grouped by their destination protocol/ports.

encrypted.description: The number of encrypted flows in the edge.

firstSeen.description: Contains the date when the edge was first seen.

lastSeen.description: Contains the date when the edge was last seen.

namespace.description: Namespace of the object that reported the flow.

rejectedFlows.description: Number of rejected flows in the edge.

remoteNamespace.description: Namespace of the object that was targeted by the flow.

sourceController.description: Name of the remote source controller if different than the current one.

sourceID.description: ID of the source `GraphNode` of the edge.

sourceType.description: Type of the source `GraphNode` of the edge.

parameters.description: Set the absolute end of the time window.
parameters.name: endAbsolute

parameters.description: Set the relative end of the time window.
parameters.name: endRelative

parameters.description: If set to true, each edge will contain a field called 'Details' which provides detailed information per protocol/port.
parameters.name: includeDetails

parameters.description: Filtering query. Consequent `q` parameters will form an or.
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: Set the absolute start of the time window.
parameters.name: startAbsolute

parameters.description: Set the relative start of the time window.
parameters.name: startRelative
